title: Any word yet as to what programming Capital Broadcasting's WILM will carry beginning January 1, 2017 when CBS switches to WWAY?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/12/what-programming-will-capital-broadcastings-wilm-carry-beginning-jan-1-2017-when-cbs-switches-to-wway/
